about_the_game:
Grow, feed and care for your colony of adorable isopods in this realistic semi-idle simulator. Watch your isopods multiply and split or sell your colony if they become too numerous. Created by the Kunstaat community, 100% of our proceeds of the full games support charity!

Isopod Keeping Simulator is a project made by the community, join the discord to contribute to the development. You can even contribute without any prior experience by doing research.

The demo only includes one species and one enclosure. The demo species is the Rubber Ducky. It will most likely be updated over time to better represent the full game. The demo excludes some systems like temperature and some progression mechanics. It should include around 30 minutes of gameplay but there isn't a time limit on it so go wild and play for 100 hours!

Features:

  • You can contribute to the development on the discord to support charity!

  • Realistic isopod behavior

  • Naming isopods

  • Picking up things to see the isopods underneath

  • Cute lads
